meanings.definition: A man who is part of the bridal party at a wedding.
meanings.sent1: The groomsman wore a suit and stood next to the groom.
meanings.sent2: The groomsman helped the groom get ready for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The groomsman made sure the groom's tie was straight, but accidentally tied it to his own.
meanings.sent4: As the groomsman, he was the groom's right-hand man throughout the wedding.
meanings.sent5: The groomsman's smile lit up the room as he walked down the aisle.

meanings.definition: To act as a groomsman in a wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent1: He will groomsman for his best friend's wedding next month.
meanings.sent2: She groomsmaned at her sister's wedding with pride.
meanings.sent3: The way he groomsmaned was so organized, it impressed everyone.
meanings.sent4: She groomsmaned as if it was the most important role in the wedding.
meanings.sent5: They groomsmaned together seamlessly, making the wedding day perfect.
